mapper.select: SELECT park_recharge.id, park_recharge.memberUuid, park_member.lpm as memberLPM, tsn, rAmont,bAmont,aAmont, operateUuid, park_manager.number as operateNumber, deviceSN, park_device.number as deviceNumber, companyUuid, createTime FROM park_recharge LEFT OUTER JOIN park_member ON park_recharge.memberUuid = park_member.uuid LEFT OUTER JOIN park_device ON park_recharge.deviceSN =park_device.sn WHERE companyUuid = #{companyUUID} ORDER BY id DESC
